official-title.#text:
To create competition in the Department of Agriculture’s
		  canned tuna purchasing program to strengthen the Department’s buying power,
		  increase the availability of canned tuna to school lunch, child nutrition, and
		  other Federal nutrition programs, and create jobs in the domestic canning
		  industry.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2842 IH: To create competition in the Department of Agriculture’s canned tuna purchasing program to strengthen the Department’s buying power, increase the availability of canned tuna to school lunch, child nutrition, and other Federal nutrition programs, and create jobs in the domestic canning industry.
